response.overview: In Florence, a Middle-aged lady and assumedly her daughter and grand daughter, are pacing in front of the train station of Florence. The lady with a quite bourgeois standing is talking on her phone and going back and forth, shuffling behind her the two girls . The situation takes place in front of the train station Santa Maria Novella, built in 1933. The story being recounted is what she apparently just experienced: a typical street scene which seems to happens every day to the street sellers in Florence and other Italian cities.
response.title: La corsa del venditore
